Boston Area Real Estate Investors Association

July 17, 2008- Monthly Meeting
Running with the Big Dogs with Robert Wallace, Patrick Queally and Ann Bellamy

Finding those ever elusive Equity Partners

1. Can your deal be funded conventionally? Learn when it can and when it can't and where to go when it can't.
2. Should you look for Hard Money? Learn when to use and when NOT to use it.
3. Learn how lenders look at deals
4. Learn the top 3 things lenders want to know when evaluating your deal.
5. Learn what all your options are.
6. Learn how to bild credibility and relationships in borrowing and deal structuring.
7. Learn how "Rehab Lending" is different from hard money and when that matters.
8. Learn how to grow your investing business with Equity partners and learn to run with the big dogs.

5:30 PM - Networking
6:30 PM - Meeting

Location: Hilton Garden Inn, 420 Totten Pond Rd, Waltham, Ma
Free to Boston AREIA members (please see website for details - http://www.BostonAREI..., Visitors only $25 at the door.
